start.name: You
sentences: (Awakening, slow, absolute clarity) (First real word, calm, integrated) The convention.

lyra_perfect_smile.name: Lyra
sentences: (Wakes abruptly, staring, tears welling) (Whispering, barely audible) You... you remember all of it?

ranting.name: You
sentences: (Slight smile, overwhelming compassion) The crash. On the way to the convention. You were driving too fast because we were late. And you were wearing that ridiculous costume under your jacket. You kept that secret even in my dream.

guardian_said.name: Guardian
sentences: (Breaks down, head in hands) I'm so sorry. I should have driven slower. I never meant... I just kept sketching because I couldn't bear to leave you alone.

echo_said.name: You
sentences: (Whisper, Narrative Text, audible only to MC) You forgave them long ago. I am the forgiveness you kept.

touching_face.name: You
sentences: (Gently touching Lyra's face, a gesture of absolution) It's okay. The dream was the war, Lyra, and we won. The fault doesn't matter now.

guardian_saying.name: Guardian
sentences: I'm whole now. I see you for who you truly are, guilt and all.
